milestones: Prospective Nobel Prize for Higgs boson work disputed
2010 Sakurai Prize awarded for 1964 Higgs Boson theory work
India and China to develop friendly relations
Study suggests 'sleeping sickness' parasite mutated to evade immune system defences
Sakurai Prize awarded for Higgs boson theories
UN General Assembly approves measures to protect economic, social and cultural rights
American trio wins the 2007 Nobel Prize in Economics
Fiji's War of the Ribbons
Tobacco attracts predators with chemicals in response to caterpillars, a study finds
Exploding toads confuse scientists
Italians vote on fertility referendum
US reveals Internet security efforts
Scientists progress towards cloaking device
Lithuania plans to adopt euro in 2007
Imperfect immune systems help avoid autoimmune disease
Palestinians get interim aid
Foreign Secretary level talks between India and Pakistan to resume in November
Japanese researchers create smell sensor using genetically engineered frog eggs
U.K. National Portrait Gallery threatens U.S. citizen with legal action over Wikimedia images
Interview with gay marriage movement founder Evan Wolfson

duck: Mechanism (philosophy), a theory that all natural phenomena can be explained by physical causes
Defence mechanism, unconscious mechanisms aimed at reducing anxiety
mechanism definition: a piece of machinery.
Mechanism (sociology), a theory that all social phenomena can be explained by the existence of a deterministic mechanism
Machine - A machine is a tool consisting of one or more parts that is constructed to achieve a particular goal.
Antikythera mechanism, an ancient Greek analog computer
Mechanism (biology), explaining how a feature is created
Mechanism (band), a death metal band from Canada
Mechanism (engineering), rigid bodies connected by joints in order to accomplish a desired force and/or motion transmission

wiki.text:
'Mechanism' may refer to:

*Mechanism (engineering), rigid bodies connected by joints in order to
accomplish a desired force and/or motion transmission *Mechanism (biology),
explaining how a feature is created *Mechanism (philosophy), a theory that all
natural phenomena can be explained by physical causes *Mechanism (sociology), a
theory that all social phenomena can be explained by the existence of a
deterministic mechanism *Mechanism (band), a death metal band from Canada
wiki.title: mechanism
